text:
@JGilliam_SEAL @PatriotDreams @realDonaldTrump This is scary.

Is this really about this same Coronavirus Pandemic?

Has it quickly changed from saving people from the virus to jailing people for the Virus?

Democrats don't hold back to exert tyranny at every little opportunity they get🤮
